response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs. We understand its worth to you is $1,500,000, and we appreciate your interest. Our initial offer for this exceptional product is $1,200,000. We believe this price reflects the quality and value it brings to you while ensuring a fair return for our investment. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, and we look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1200000}
